text: Monroeville High School is a public high school in Monroeville, Ohio. It is the only high school in the Monroeville Local Schools district. Their nickname is the Eagles. They are members of the Firelands Conference. ==Ohio High School Athletic Association State Championships== * Boys Basketball – 1984 * Wrestling - 2010 ==League championshipshttp://www.monroevilleschools.org/Athletics.aspx== *Baseball: 1964, 1965, 1967, 1968, 1969, 1971, 1972, 1973 *Boys Basketball: 1963–64, 1964–65, 1967–68, 1971–72, 1974–75, 1975–76, 1982–83, 1983–84 *Girls Basketball: 1978-79 *Boys Cross Country: 1984 *Girls Cross Country: *Football: 1963, 1978, 1985, 1987, 1988, 1992, 1998, 2002, 2004, 2006 *Softball: *Boys Track and Field: 2003, 2004, 2007, 2008 *Girls Track and Field: *Volleyball: 1986, 1988, 2011 *Wrestling: 1997, 1998, 2000 ==Alumni== * Logan Stieber, 4x State Champion wrestler; 4x NCAA Champion at Ohio State ==Notes and references== ==External links== * District Website Category:High schools in Huron County, Ohio Category:Public high schools in Ohio
title: Monroeville High School (Ohio)
